content:
Product: HiveSmart Light Bulb A60
Category: Smart Home
Description: Energy-efficient Wi-Fi LED bulb controllable via the TechHive app or voice assistants.
Price: €19.99
Features: [Dimmable, 16 million colors, Compatible with Alexa and Google Home]

Product: HiveCam 360 Pro
Category: Smart Home
Description: Indoor security camera with 360° rotation and AI motion detection.
Price: €89.99
Features: [Full HD, Night vision, Two-way audio, Local & cloud storage]

Product: GameCore X1 Mechanical Keyboard
Category: Gaming Hardware
Description: RGB mechanical keyboard designed for competitive gamers.
Price: €129.00
Features: [Hot-swappable switches, USB-C, RGB lighting, Anti-ghosting]

Product: PulseVR One Headset
Category: Wearables
Description: Lightweight VR headset for PC and standalone gaming.
Price: €349.00
Features: [4K resolution, Inside-out tracking, Wireless mode]

Product: HiveWatch Active 2
Category: Wearables
Description: Smartwatch with health tracking and customizable digital faces.
Price: €179.00
Features: [Heart rate monitoring, Sleep tracking, GPS, 7-day battery life]

Product: StreamBeam 4K Stick
Category: Smart Home
Description: Compact streaming stick supporting all major apps and voice control.
Price: €59.99
Features: [4K HDR, Dual-band Wi-Fi, Remote with mic, AirPlay support]

Product: HiveAir Smart Purifier
Category: Smart Home
Description: Air purifier that monitors and cleans your indoor air automatically.
Price: €199.00
Features: [HEPA filter, Air quality sensor, App integration, Silent mode]

Product: SoundHive Pro Wireless Headset
Category: Gaming Hardware
Description: Over-ear wireless gaming headset with immersive 3D audio.
Price: €149.00
Features: [Noise cancellation, Detachable mic, 20-hour battery, Low latency]

Product: HiveDock Pro USB-C Hub
Category: Computers & Accessories
Description: Multiport dock for laptops with power delivery and HDMI.
Price: €89.00
Features: [8-in-1 hub, 100W charging, 4K HDMI, SD card reader]

Product: EcoCharge Solar Bank
Category: Accessories
Description: Solar-powered power bank for sustainable charging.
Price: €49.99
Features: [10,000mAh, Fast charge, Dual USB output, Weather-resistant]

Product: HiveThermo Smart Thermostat
Category: Smart Home
Description: AI-controlled thermostat that learns your heating preferences.
Price: €159.00
Features: [App control, Geofencing, Energy reports, Works with Alexa]

Product: TitanPlay RGB Mouse
Category: Gaming Hardware
Description: High-precision gaming mouse with customizable DPI and lighting.
Price: €69.00
Features: [16,000 DPI, Adjustable weights, RGB, Ergonomic design]

Product: CloudSafe Antivirus Premium
Category: Software & Digital Products
Description: Cloud-based security software for devices and home networks.
Price: €39.99/year
Features: [Real-time protection, VPN included, Multi-device support]

Product: HiveFit Band Mini
Category: Wearables
Description: Compact fitness tracker with heart rate and sleep analysis.
Price: €59.00
Features: [Waterproof, Step counter, 10-day battery, Bluetooth 5.0]

Product: Quantum Pro Gaming Chair
Category: Gaming Hardware
Description: Ergonomic gaming chair with lumbar support and adjustable armrests.
Price: €249.00
Features: [PU leather, Recline 135°, Head cushion, Metal base]

Product: HiveSecure Door Sensor Kit
Category: Smart Home
Description: Wireless door and window sensors for home security.
Price: €79.00
Features: [Wi-Fi, Battery powered, App alerts, Easy installation]

Product: PixelView 27Q Monitor
Category: Computers & Accessories
Description: 27-inch QHD monitor ideal for work and gaming.
Price: €299.00
Features: [144Hz refresh rate, IPS panel, HDR10, Adjustable stand]

Product: HiveDesk Mat Pro
Category: Accessories
Description: Smart desk mat with wireless charging and ambient lighting.
Price: €79.99
Features: [Wireless charger, RGB edges, Water-resistant surface]

Product: HiveHome Speaker Mini
Category: Smart Home
Description: Compact smart speaker for music, timers, and home control.
Price: €49.00
Features: [Voice assistant, Bluetooth, 360° sound, Multi-room support]

Product: NovaCloud 2TB Storage Plan
Category: Software & Digital Products
Description: Secure cloud storage with collaboration and backup features.
Price: €5.99/month
Features: [End-to-end encryption, File sharing, Version history]
